Pre-Game Insights: The Ghana Football Association (GFA) has announced a free gate for all Ghanaians who will be interested in attending the game to rally their support behind the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be hosted in Kumasi at the Baba Yara Sports Stadium at exactly 8pm.
The free gate initiative is a way to show appreciation to the fans for their unwavering support throughout the Black Stars qualification journey.
Others: Ghana will face Cape Verde, Egypt and Mozambique in Group B, while, Namibia goes head-to-head with Tunisia, Mali and South Africa in Group E.
